english.segment1: Could you be my answer. Could you tell me that I am. The perfect one for you. You're the perfect one for me
english.segment2: Could you be too faithful. Could you show me anymore. It's the perfect thing to do. It's the perfect thing for me
english.segment3: On and on I see you. The life that comes together. To see that we're forever. On and on I see you. The times we've spent together. The times that last forever
english.segment4: And now we will find our way. It's the way that we'll find this day. And I know you belong to me
